title: Did the Supreme Court say that women should not own property?
subtitle: Amy Connie Barrett, a Catholic, is also affiliated with the "Thanks," a "witch Christian sect" whose teachings include the submission of women to their husbands.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Judge Amy Connie Barrett, a candidate for the Supreme Court of President Donald Trump of the United States, said that a woman should not be able to own, buy or sell property without the permission of her husband or a male relative.
